data.text: @Ovayonda1 Hi there, thank you for reaching out. Please send us your reference number in a DM. We´ll gladly check on the status for you. Kind regards, Derya

@GodsfavourAkpa2 Hi there, we are sorry to hear about your delayed baggage. As your flights have been operated by Ethiopian Airlines and Copa Airlines we can only ask you to contact them directly regarding any updates. We hope you will receive your baggage again soon. Kind regards, Chris

@Alvin_Asian Hi Alvin, the mileage bookings in economy class include 1 free checked-in baggage of 23 kg. In addition to that, your status entitles you to check in for an additional piece of 23kg. Kind regards, Derya
@philippedavidny Hi Philippe, did you send an email to our colleagues at centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com? Kind regards, Derya
@alvin_asian  Hi, the baggage allowance depends on the fare you'll book. Which flights do you want to book and which fare will you choose? Best regards, Susi

@marionenchine Hi there, we're sorry that you haven't received an answer yet. Due to the high amount of inquiries at the moment and as all cases are handled individually, you will experience a longer waiting time. We kindly ask for your patience. Kind regards, Daphne

urls.title: Hilfe & Kontakt
urls.description: Sie haben Fragen rund um Ihre Reservierungen, Ihren Flug oder Ihr Gepäck? Kontaktieren Sie uns über unser Kontaktformular.Wir helfen Ihnen gerne weiter.

data.text: @bagelbabo Hi Bagel, vielen Dank für diesen Hinweis! Natürlich sollte dieser Link auf die richtige Webseite führen. Wir haben dieses Problem gleich weitergeleitet. Bitte nutze doch diesen Link: https://t.co/YRTi6bIUO2 Liebe Grüße, Daphne

domain.name: Product Taxonomy
domain.description: A product taxonomy for labeling categories of products.

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @mf_newson Hi Michael, we're truly sorry that you haven't received an answer yet. Please send us your case nr. (22XX-OS-XXXXX) via DM and we can check if it's correctly submitted and forwarded to the responsible colleagues. Kind regards, Daphne

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@raacolii [2/2] Once again we are sorry for the inconvenience and kindly ask you to contact us via our online form for further feedback. Please feel free to use the following link: https://t.co/KvLtbwEr8U
Best regards, Shawn

@raacolii [1/2] Hi there, 
we are sorry to hear that your flight was affected by an overbooking. Unfortunately, overselling is a common practice in the travel and lodging industry. In this case, affected passengers do receive financial compensation and the right to care.

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @philippedavidny Hi Philippe, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding.  Kind regards, Chris

@djsassan Hi there, we are sorry to hear that you were facing difficulties trying to contact us. Is there anything we can still assist you with? If you are referring to an already existing booking please send us the booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Chris

@DaciAdrian Hi, we kindly apologize for the impression you had. However, we want to emphasize on the fact that our passengers are not specifically singled out for questioning based on their ethnicity. We strongly distance ourselves from any form of racism. Kind regards, Chris

@JochenFromm @_Torski Hi Jochen, es tut uns sehr leid, dass es während deiner Reise zu diesen Unannehmlichkeiten gekommen ist. Bitte wende dich an den Kontakt, der auf dem Property Irregularity Report (PIR) zu finden ist. Liebe Grüße, Denis
@StefanGreimel @Rolandismyname Hallo Stefan, vielen Dank für dein Feedback! Wir werden es intern weiterleiten und möchten uns für die entstandenen Unannehmlichkeiten entschuldigen. Liebe Grüße, Denis
@bexbexbex__ @away Hi there, we have answered you on your other post. Kind regards, Daphne
@ImTracyWard Hi there, you will get an answer within a few days. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Funda

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @JanHrivnakUS Hi Jan, I'm very sorry that you have not received an answer from our colleagues, yet. They are currently working through a backlog of claims. If you haven't done so already, please fill out our feedback form here https://t.co/FFefe6Jqyt Kind regards, Petra
@Thebulat2 You're Welcome! We are happy to help. Best regards, Denis

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@BillyBog1 Hi Billy, I do understand your frustration and your anger. To bring your request to notice I would kindly ask you to fill out our online form on https://t.co/CLg72NPXF9
Best regards, Denis
@Beurmanba Hi, if I could, I would have brought you some personally. But our colleagues on board will definitely have some for you! 😉 Have a pleasant flight! ✈️ Kind regards, Daphne
@Beurmanba Hi there, we're happy to read that you like our chocolate! It's made in Austria by our manufacturer Salzburg Schokolade. 😊 Kind regards, Daphne

data.text: @terrileeedit @berlinairport Hi there, what about via Facebook or Instagram? Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @rcgbob Hi Bob, thank you for sharing your honest feedback with us. To bring your feedback to notice please fill out the following contact form https://t.co/H47kr4v9Jy. We look forward to providing you with a smoother experience next time. Kind regards, Derya

@ChicagoDerek Hi Derek, we are sorry to hear that your baggage is still missing. Did you try to call the number shown on your missing luggage report? Unfortunately, we the Social Media Team, cannot help you with tracking missing baggage. Kind regards, Derya

@leejwilliams Hi Lee, we are sorry that you have not received a reply yet. Unfortunately, our colleagues are currently working through a backlog of claims. They will be in touch as soon as they can. We apologize for the delay and further inconvenience caused. Kind regards, Petra
@SBAgility Hi Simon, thank you for reaching out. Please send an email to our colleagues at specialcases@austrian.com. They will be happy to assist you with your inquiry. Kind regards, Derya

#65years have never looked better! 🎉

Today, 65 years ago, was the birth of Austrian Airlines, or our "AUA" as it is affectionately known in Austria, until today. 🇦🇹

We are curious: when did you fly with us for the first time? ✈️💖

#WeAreAustrian #FeelsLikeAustrian https://t.co/rQgMLKu9Uc

@TvExplode Hi there, thank you for reaching out. Given the increased requests at the moment the processing time is above average. We appreciate your continued patience. Rest assured that your reimbursement will take place as soon as possible. Kind regards, Derya

@nikolausf Hallo Nikolaus, seit 1. Juni besteht auf Austrian Flügen keine Maskenpflicht mehr. Davon ausgenommen sind Flüge in Länder, in denen weiterhin eine Maskenpflicht besteht – stand Juni waren es ca. 14 Länder. Liebe Grüße, Denis
@TerriLeeedit @berlinairport Hi Terri, please send us your reference number in a DM. Kind regards, Derya
@RCGBob Hi Bob, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything we can assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @DaciAdrian Hi there, please use the following form on the desktop version of our homepage to send your request https://t.co/iSWK3YnzlN Kind regards, Chris

@andreu1714 Hi, unfortunately, we are not able to resend it as this is handled by a specific department. Please reply to the email you have previously received from them in connection with your request. Kind regards, Derya
@davidmccarter  Hi David, I see what you mean, thank you for your feedback, I will forward it to the respective department. Kind regards, Petra

@ashutosh1153 [2/2]We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding.
Best regards, Gayle

@ashutosh1153 [1/2]Dear Ashutosh, 
We are very sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report or use this link to track your baggage status online https://t.co/5a1xgUCD33

data.text: @DavidMcCarter Hi David, please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly take a closer look into your tariff regulations. Kind regards, Derya

@Andreu1714 Hi, kindly check your emails or spam folder again. Our colleagues requested information from you on 12.07. Please reply to the email you received directly. Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @MarwaAb17 Hi Marwa, please contact our call center for rebooking https://t.co/0n0AgRRxAO Unfortunately, we cannot assist with rebooking in urgent cases. Kind regards, Lyndsa

urls.title: Seminar – Visit Austrian
urls.description: Sie sehen, wie die Tragflächen schwingen, als ob sie jeden Moment brechen würden. Sie hören ein Geräusch und denken sofort an eine Unregelmäßigkeit. Ihre Handflächen werden feucht und kalt, Ihr Herz klopft und Ihr Magen krampft sich zusammen. Alles in Ihnen wehrt sich gegen weitere Minute im Flugzeug. Kennen Sie dieses Gefühl? Sie sind nicht allein. Etwa ein Drittel aller Fluggäste fühlt sich beim Fliegen nicht wohl oder leidet unter Flugangst. Angst vor dem Fliegen ist weder ein Einzelschicksal noch

urls.title: ORF-TVthek
urls.description: Nachrichten, Magazine, Dokumentationen, Diskussionen, Kultur, Sport, Shows, Comedys, Filme, Serien, Regional- und Kindersendungen: Die Videoplattform ORF-TVthek bietet mehr als 200 ORF-TV-Sendungen als Livestream und Video-on-Demand an. Die Videoarchive erlauben zudem einen Blick ins ORF-Archiv zu zeit- und kulturgeschichtlichen Themen.

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @MarwaAb17 Hi Marwa, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/vp44F2Gckn Kind regards, Chris

@vagelis_h Hi Vagelis, sorry for any frustration caused. Due to the high amount of requests we receive at the moment we ask for your understanding that the response can take longer than usual. Please be assured that all requests are being answered. Kind regards, Chris
@importwithease Hi there, I´m sorry to hear you had difficulties solving your issue via phone. Please contact us via DM with your booking code and your request. Kind regards, Derya
@rturcan your case nr. (22XX-OS-XXXXX) and we can check if it has been submitted correctly and forwarded to the responsible colleagues. Kind regards, Daphne [2/2]

@rturcan Hi Romeo, we're sorry that you haven't received an answer yet. Due to the high amount of inquiries and as all cases are handled individually, the processing and answering may be a longer waiting time than usual. You can send us via DM [1/2]

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@dhorghidan [2/2]Please send your compensation request to my colleagues from Feedback Management via our online form https://t.co/DlPk2wk146
Best regards, Gayle

@dhorghidan [1/2] Hello Diana,
I'm terribly sorry for all the inconvenience. Please be assured that our colleagues are working around the clock to process each bag and reunite passengers with their luggage.

@woahwoahbrodie Hi there, we recommend you to inform yourself about the waiting times at the security checks and also at the passport control to make sure you are at the gate on time. Therefore please get in touch with the airport itself. Kind regards, Derya

@ena_rov Hello Rov,
we would be happy to help you in this case. Therefore please share as many details as possible with us, so that we can assist you in the best way we can.
We will await your reply and thank you for contacting us.
Kind regards,
Alessandra

@TerriLeeedit [2/2] Please send an email to our colleagues at viellos@austrian.com or dial the number shown on your missing luggage report. We hope you will be reunited with your baggage soon. Kind regards, Derya

@TerriLeeedit [1/2] Hi Terri, we regret to hear that your baggage was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you.
@dianisjimenez Hi there, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties with our homepage. Is there anything that we can assist you with? Kind regards, Chris
@DiegoBruschi_ Hi Diego, I just replied to your DM. Best regards, Sandra

@EugeneJ89312567 Hi Eugene, as already explained, the social media team does unfortunately not have access to the baggage system. However, if you filed a report online you can check the status of your baggage via the following link https://t.co/5a1xgUCD33 Kind regards, Chris

@PPRcomms Hi there, Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues for any potential queries or revision requests. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @yakoubi_rihab Hi Rihab, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/O5n3NuTvkn  Kind regards, Chris
@philippedavidny @berlinairport @philippedavidny (3/3) We apologize for the delay and the inconvenience caused. Kind regards, Petra

@philippedavidny @berlinairport @philippedavidny (2/3) our colleagues are doing their best to get back to you as soon as possible. Unfortunately, our colleagues are currently working through a backlog of claims. They will be in touch as soon as they can.

@philippedavidny @berlinairport @philippedavidny (1/3) Dear Philippe, we are sorry that you have not received a reply yet. Certain events, such as the current situation in the airline industry, which is suffering from shortages, cause longer processing times than usual. Still, we can assure you that

@EugeneJ89312567 [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. Best regards, Shawn

@EugeneJ89312567 [1/2] Hi Ej, 
We are sorry to hear that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@ClaireDoerr15 [3/3]  We kindly ask for your continued patience. Thank you.
Best regards, Shawn

@ClaireDoerr15 [2/3] Every case is checked and answered individually to ensure all applicable reimbursement options are offered. Please send us your reference number via PM, so we can check if your submission has been received and lined up correctly.

@ClaireDoerr15 [1/3] Hi Claire, we understand that we're testing our guests' patience at the moment. Our respective colleagues are doing their best to answer all requests as quickly as possible. The process time takes longer due to the huge amount of requests incoming on a daily basis.

@VongSoftware [2/2] und bearbeiten diese auch individuell. Aus diesem Anlass nehmen die Bearbeitungen aller Anfragen etwas mehr Zeit in Anspruch. Unsere Kolleg:innen werden sich bei dir melden, sofern sie Informationen haben. Vielen Dank für dein Verständnis.
Liebe Grüße, Shawn

@VongSoftware [1/2] Hi! Wir bedauern zu hören, dass du bist jetzt keine Rückmeldung erhalten hast. Das ist natürlich nicht der Service den wir unseren Gästen bieten möchten und entspricht nicht unserem Standard. Unsere zuständigen Kolleg:innen erhalten derzeit täglich sehr viele Anfragen ..
@PPRcomms @FrankBarrettMoS Hi I'm sorry to learn, that the offered compensation doesn't find your approval. All cases are checked in detail and handled according the guidelines. Best regards, Sandra

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @AlexliuIs Hi Alex, I can understand your anger. Please submit your case via the following form: https://t.co/BythwKeZHU Our colleagues from Feedback Management will get back to you as soon as possible. Kind regards, Funda

@philippedavidny to receive information concerning your luggage. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any baggage systems. We hope that you will be reunited with your bag soon! Kind regards, Daphne [2/2]

@philippedavidny Hi Philippe, we're truly sorry that you haven't received your luggage. If you have filed a report at the airport, you will have received a missing luggage report, where the responsible colleagues are stated. Please refer to  that contact [1/2]
@jpoch88 at the right department. We kindly ask for your patience.  Kind regards, Daphne [3/3]

@jpoch88 claims submitted  by you. Please refer to the contact stated on your missing luggage report directly. If you have already filed a claim, you can send us your case nr. (22XX-OS-XXXXX) via DM and we can check if it has already been queued for processing [2/3]

@jpoch88 Hi Jam, we're truly sorry that you haven't received your luggage yet. Be assured that our colleagues are doing their utmost to reunite the bags with their owners. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any baggage systems or to any [1/3]

@eugenej89312567 Hi there,  thank you for contacting us. We are sincerely sorry for the stress and inconvenience this has caused you. Have you lodged a report with the Lost & Found office at your airport of arrival? Best regards, Denis

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Pearlfdm @AustrianAirScam Hi there, I´ve answered already your private message. Best regards, Denis

@JackPar92346104 Hello Jack,
I am sorry to hear that. The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. You can check the status of your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeJ2rHC Best regards, Alessandra

@AndreasZommer Hi Andreas, es tut uns leid, dass du deinen Koffer nicht erhalten hast. Aufgrund der hohen Anzahl an Anfragen und da diese von unseren KollegInnen individuell bearbeitet werden, kann es zu längeren Wartezeiten kommen. Wir bitten um Geduld. Liebe Grüße, Daphne

@harvey_chow @Apple Hi, if you have already submitted your case & received a case nr. (22XX-OS-XXXXX) then your inquiry is already queued for processing.Please mind that due to the considerable amount of inquiries sent to us, you may experience a longer waiting time. We kindly ask for your patience.

@harvey_chow @apple Hi Harvey, I'm sorry that you're still missing your bag. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact stated on your Passenger Irregularity Report (PIR). Best regards, Denis
@paulussporidis @unlimapps Hi there, we are really sorry to learn about the inconveniences you had when travelling with us. How can we assist you? Kind regards, Funda

data.text: @CelineSpithoven Hi Celine, unfortunately, we, the social media team, do not have access to the baggage system and can therefore only ask you one more time to get in touch with your last operating airline, Thai Smile Airways. Thank you for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
